levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 Tremor Count
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Paralysis] and 2 [Binding] next turn
[DefeatDuel] Gain +3 Tremor Count
[DefeatDuel] Lose 10 SP
[EndSkillAll] Lose SP equal to ([Binding] on self * 5)
levelList.name: Contracting Straight-jacket

levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Spend 5 Tremor Count and gain +1 Atk Weight for this Skill
[EndSkillAll] Lose SP equal to ([Binding] on self * 5)
[WhenUse] Gain +4 Tremor Count
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Paralysis] and 3 [Binding] next turn
[WhenUse] When below -15 SP, Final Power +3
[WhenUse] When below -25 SP, Final Power +2
levelList.name: Metallic Ringing

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 Offense Level Down next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 Plus Coin Drop next turn

levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Spend 5 Tremor Count and gain +1 Atk Weight for this Skill (Max +2)
[EndSkillAll] Lose SP equal to ([Binding] on self * 6)
[WhenUse] Gain 4 [Paralysis] and 4 [Binding] next turn
[WhenUse] When below -15 SP, Final Power +3
[WhenUse] When below -25 SP, Final Power +2
[EnemyKill] Gain +6 Tremor Count
levelList.name: Unleashed Violence

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Tremor Burst,
Then deal Wrath Damage by 100% of the final Stagger Threshold Raised by Tremor Burst. (Max 100)

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Tremor Burst,
Then deal Wrath Damage by 100% of the final Stagger Threshold Raised by Tremor Burst. (Max 100)

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Tremor Burst,
Then deal Wrath Damage by 150% of the final Stagger Threshold Raised by Tremor Burst. (Max 150)
Reduce Tremor Count by 3

levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain +6 Tremor Count
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Paralysis] and 4 [Binding] next turn
[EndSkill] At less than 0 SP, heal 10 SP. When at less than 0 SP, heal more SP the further this unit's SP value is from 0 (heal 1 additional SP for every missing SP; max 25)
levelList.name: Gathering Spite

coindescs.desc:
